page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS
page.content: On Sunday 28th April a cycle race was held in Albrighton.For further details refer to Notable Events.To celebrate 40 years of peace we had a big V.E Day Parade.In this parade all the Brownies, Guides,Cubs and Scouts took part.It was a great success. Just lately the Albrighton County Junior School and the Amateur Dramatic Society have launched a Stage Lighting Appeal Fund among other fund raising events we published a famous people's cookery book.In this we wrote off to famous personalities asking them for their favourite recipes.We compiled these in a book which costs Â£1.50.The Operatic Society will perform "Sweet Hearts"to assist the appeal.The target is Â£4000 in all.
